title: FRED Expands G.19 Consumer Credit Release
description:
FRED has expanded its coverage of the Federal Reserve Board’s G.19 Consumer Credit Release with an additional 36 monthly series. These series cover Total and Revolving/Non-revolving Consumer Credit.

The post FRED Expands G.19 Consumer Credit Release first appeared on St. Louis Fed Economic Research.
content:encoded:
FRED has expanded its coverage of the Federal Reserve Board’s G.19 Consumer Credit Release with an additional 36 monthly series.

These series cover Total and Revolving/Non-revolving Consumer Credit.

The post FRED Expands G.19 Consumer Credit Release first appeared on St. Louis Fed Economic Research.
